name: electron-net-monorepo
description: Monorepo for Electron client and .NET server integration

scripts.build:server: cd Server && dotnet publish -c Release -r win-x64 --self-contained true -p:PublishSingleFile=true
scripts.build: npm run build:server && npm run build:client
scripts.dev: npm run build:server && npm run start
scripts.clean: cd Server && dotnet clean && cd ../Client && npm run clean
